solutions.issue_context: Jep at Cesar (B.M.): Surprise cancellation and lack of transparency from client
solutions.ai_suggestion: Conduct a post-mortem review of the last 60 days of client communications to identify missed signals or warning signs. Schedule a transparency call with the client to clarify expectations for future offboarding and communication protocols.
solutions.stakeholder_notes: Conduct a post-mortem review of the last 60 days of client communications to identify missed signals or warning signs. Schedule a transparency call with the client to clarify expectations for future offboarding and communication protocols.
solutions.final_solution: Conduct a post-mortem review of the last 60 days of client communications to identify missed signals or warning signs. Schedule a transparency call with the client to clarify expectations for future offboarding and communication protocols.
